Uses of Class
tool.AttackTool

  • Packages that use AttackTool 
    Package Description
    perso
    Perso classes are used to defined the kind of character to play with.
    square
    Square classes are used to defined the component of the game board.
    tool
    Tool classes are used to defined the kind of surprise.
